title: The Papers: 'King of Hearts' and NHS targets to be axed
description: King Charles III's first Christmas Day speech dominates the headlines as papers reflect on his message.

title: US storm: Death toll in historic Arctic freeze rises to 24
description: Transport chaos and power cuts wreak havoc as much of North America shivers in blizzard conditions.

title: Doctor Who trailer drops for fans at Christmas
description: Russell T Davies says he wants to give fans "a lovely little Christmas present".

title: Austria avalanche buries at least 10 people at ski resort
description: Helicopters and rescue teams with dogs are searching for survivors at a ski resort in western Austria.

title: UK weather: Ice warnings and rail strikes set for Boxing Day
description: Warnings for ice and snow are in place in parts of the UK as rail strikes continue on Boxing Day.

title: Tribute paid to woman fatally struck by police car on Christmas Eve
description: The family of Rachael Moore, 22, who died on Christmas Eve, describes her as a "caring friend".

title: Al-Shabab: 14 Iranian fishermen freed years after abduction
description: Some of the 14 fishermen were abducted by al-Shabab militants off the Somali coast eight years ago.

title: Wallasey pub shooting: Woman fatally shot was not targeted - police
description: The 26-year-old was shot in the head, while four others were injured - one critically.

title: Charlo-Tszyu off as undisputed world champion breaks hand
description: Jermell Charlo's bout with Tim Tszyu is postponed after the undisputed super-welterweight world champion breaks his hand in training.

title: King refers to hardship and food banks in first message
description: In his first Christmas speech, King Charles praises public services and volunteers helping those in need.

title: Monmouthshire homes without water on Christmas Day
description: Welsh Water apologises as several villages are left without water on Christmas Day.

title: Edgware: Man arrested after woman dies in Christmas Day crash
description: The 22-year-old was in a car involved in a crash with a vehicle that had failed to stop for police.

title: Hundreds brave North Sea in Christmas Day dips
description: The charity fundraisers were held in Lowestoft, Felixstowe and Southwold.

title: Foreign aid groups halt work after Taliban ban on female staff
description: Three NGOs are suspending operations in Afghanistan after women were banned from working for them.

title: In pictures: World celebrates Christmas
description: One of the holiest days for Christians is marked with festivities and prayer around the world.

title: Pope Francis says world suffering a "famine of peace"
description: In his Christmas Day message, the pontiff also called for an "immediate end" to the war in Ukraine.

title: Brentford v Tottenham: Spurs boss Conte may rest all his World Cup stars
description: Tottenham boss Antonio Conte suggests he will only select players who were not involved in the World Cup for his side's Boxing Day match at Brentford.

title: Quiz: Can you order these Premier League club kits from the past 30 years?
description: How well can you remember kits from the past 30 years? Eight kits for each team have been jumbled up - your job is to put them in the right order.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury remembers Queen's example in Christmas message
description: The Archbishop will remember the late monarch's ability to put her own interest after those she served.

title: King Charles to celebrate Christmas at Sandringham with family
description: Members of the Royal Family will attend a morning service at St Mary Magdalene Church.

title: 'Maybe just a tenner's worth of salmon?' - Play Secret Santa with England women
description: Freya Davies, Alice Davidson-Richards, Nat Sciver and Katherine Brunt share what they would buy their teammates for Secret Santa.

title: India beat Bangladesh in Dhaka thriller to wrap up series win
description: India win a nailbiter in Dhaka to beat Bangladesh and secure a 2-0 series win.

title: NFL week 16: Cowboys beat the Eagles, Vikings win another close game, Niners go eight in a row
description: The Dallas Cowboys hand Philadelphia Eagles their second loss of the season while the Minnesota Vikings create more NFL history.

title: Canada coach crash leaves more than 50 injured
description: It is not yet known what caused the crash involving an intercity coach on Christmas Eve.

title: Wallasey: Police hunting gunman as woman dies after pub shooting
description: Merseyside Police have released details of a suspected gunman they say fled the scene.

title: US winter storm: Americans and Canadians face mass outages on Christmas Day
description: At least 19 deaths are linked to a massive winter storm that continues to pummel the US and Canada.

title: The corner shop opening its doors on Christmas Day to tackle loneliness
description: A corner shop in Twickenham has been opening on Christmas Day for 25 years to help fight loneliness.

title: Weather, wildlife and wonder: Your pictures of 2022
description: A selection of striking images from our readers around the world.

title: The UK charity helping Holy Land donkeys
description: A UK charity runs the only shelter for ill-treated and abandoned donkeys in the West Bank.

title: Baseball, power and war - 2022's key words
description: While the news dominated the choices there was room for some more unusual expressions.

title: Pope condemns human 'hunger for wealth and power' at Christmas Eve Mass
description: His comments at Christmas Eve Mass in the Vatican follow previous comments about the war in Ukraine.

title: Film lookahead: 23 highlights to look out for in 2023
description: From Oscars hopefuls such as The Fabelmans to crowd-pleasers like the Barbie movie.

title: Quiz of the Year, part three: Can you even remember the summer?
description: How well do you remember the news of the past 12 months?

title: Maxi Jazz: Tributes hail Faithless singer as an 'incredible talent'
description: Dutch trance legend Armin van Buuren hopes the London singer's music keeps on "inspiring others".

title: James Webb telescope: Amazing images show the Universe as never before
description: It's a year since the James Webb telescope launched, and we've marvelled at its pictures ever since.

title: George and Charlotte sing at Westminster Abbey carol service
description: The Christmas Eve service was organised by the Princess of Wales and featured tributes to the late Queen.

title: Kirsty Young: Former Desert Island Discs presenter reveals 'awful' experience with chronic pain
description: The former Desert Island Discs host returns to the radio programme - this time as the interviewee.
